attributes.action: take a lead proposing and preparing for converting the EU into a fully sovereign Federal United Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to take steps in proposing and then help begin the lengthy process of converting the present European Union into a fully sovereign, federal republic state - United Europe or United States of Europe. Britain, or England at any rate to be a key state in the new Europe, with Brussels as political capital and London the 'New York' of Europe.
